user_query: I'm a music blogger and I'm looking for new artists to feature on my website. Can you recommend some popular artists and their top songs? Also, I would like to get the details of one of their songs. Additionally, could you suggest a playlist featuring songs from these artists?

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of popular music artists along with their top songs.
Select one artist from the list and fetch details of one of their top songs.
Create a playlist featuring songs from the recommended artists.
